title: Leave It to Nico!
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Nico-san, your sandwich is delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, of course!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I’ve never eaten a sandwich like this before... Is this an original recipe?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It’s not really anything original. Just something Nico whipped up with yesterday’s leftovers.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>What!? You made something this tasty with leftovers!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, Nico made it, so it’s bound to be good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I’d love to eat this every day...... Can you make it again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, this really is just a combination of some random leftovers... Even the seasoning was to taste, so perfectly recreating it might be difficult...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Whaaat!?? No... no way......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>No way...? You liked it that much!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I did... I really liked it. Nico-san, I want to eat this again!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Alright, alright! I’ll try to figure it out!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
